预兆-植物: 清新的花香轻拂鼻尖 Fresh floral notes tickle the nose
森林地面散发出的气味并不完全令人不快 Not altogether unpleasant smell of forest floor
不合时宜或季节错乱，出现叶子、果实或坚果 Out of place or season, leaves/fruit/nuts
授粉者/害虫，蝴蝶/蜜蜂/虫群聚集 Pollinators/pests, butterflies/bees/bugs swarming
断裂的苔藓树皮条，排成一条直线 Broken strips of mossy Bark, all in a line
草地或碎屑，中间分开 Grass or detritus, parted down the middle
鸟巢翻覆，焦急的父母尖声鸣叫 Bird Nest, upturned, frantic parents screeching
异常弯曲却未折断的枝条 Unnaturally bent twigs, somehow unsnapped
黑色土壤，依旧湿润，结块粘连 Dark soil, still damp, clinging in clogs
散播种子，意外地繁花盛开 Shed seeds, blossoms in unexpected profusion
深沟纵横，似有物自地底被强行拽出 Deep Furrows, as something wrenched from earth
刻意、拖曳般的痕迹伴随着抓痕 Deliberate, drag-like tracks passing scratches
